001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
004import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.NotificationMessage;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusRequest;
012
013import java.math.BigInteger;
014import java.util.Locale;
015
016/**
017 * Malfunction code to report to Tandem is getErrorString
018 */
019/**
020 * Malfunction code to report to Tandem is getErrorString
021 *
022
023 *
024 * <br>
025 *
026 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusRequest}, opCode 121, size 11
027 *
028 * <br>
029 *
030 * 
031 * <table border='1'>
032 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
033 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>121</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
034 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>11</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
035 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
036 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CURRENT_STATUS}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
037 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.MalfunctionStatusRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
038 * </table>
039 */@MessageProps(
040    opCode=121,
041    size=11,
042    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
043    characteristic=Characteristic.CURRENT_STATUS,
044    request= MalfunctionStatusRequest.class
045)
046public class MalfunctionStatusResponse extends NotificationMessage {
047    
048    private long codeA;
049    private long codeB;
050    private byte[] remaining;
051
052    private String errorString;
053    
054    public MalfunctionStatusResponse() {}
055    
056    public MalfunctionStatusResponse(long codeA, long codeB, byte[] remaining) {
057        this.cargo = buildCargo(codeA, codeB, remaining);
058        parse(cargo);
059        
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * <table border="1">
064     * <caption>Parsed fields for MalfunctionStatusResponse:</caption>
065     * <tr><td><code>codeA</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
066     * <tr><td><code>codeB</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 4)</code></td></tr>
067     * <tr><td><code>remaining</code></td><td><code>Bytes.dropFirstN(raw, 8)</code></td></tr>
068     * <tr><td><code>errorString</code></td><td><code>getErrorString()</code></td></tr>
069     * </table>
070     */
071    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
072        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
073        this.cargo = raw;
074        this.codeA = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 0);
075        this.codeB = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 4);
076        this.remaining = Bytes.dropFirstN(raw, 8);
077        this.errorString = getErrorString();
078        
079    }
080
081    
082    /**
083     * <table border="1">
084     * <caption>Byte layout for MalfunctionStatusResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
085     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
086     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>toUint32(codeA) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
087     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>toUint32(codeA) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
088     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>toUint32(codeA) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
089     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint32(codeA) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
090     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>toUint32(codeB) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
091     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>toUint32(codeB) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
092     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>toUint32(codeB) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
093     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>toUint32(codeB) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
094     * </table>
095     */
096    public static byte[] buildCargo(long codeA, long codeB, byte[] remaining) {
097        return Bytes.combine(
098            Bytes.toUint32(codeA),
099            Bytes.toUint32(codeB),
100            remaining
101        );
102    }
103
104    public long getCodeA() {
105        return codeA;
106    }
107
108    public long getCodeB() {
109        return codeB;
110    }
111
112    public byte[] getRemaining() {
113        return remaining;
114    }
115
116    public String getErrorString() {
117        if (!hasMalfunction()) return "";
118        return String.format(Locale.US, "%d-%#x", getCodeA(), getCodeB());
119    }
120
121    public boolean hasMalfunction() {
122        // empty
123        if (getCodeA() == 0 && getCodeB() == 0) {
124            return false;
125        }
126
127        // 3-0x2026 -- appears to be ignorable
128        if (getCodeA() == 3 && getCodeB() == 8230) {
129            return false;
130        }
131
132        return true;
133    }
134
135    @Override
136    public int size() {
137        return (hasMalfunction() &&
138                !StringUtils.isBlank(getErrorString())) ? 1 : 0;
139    }
140}
